clip.quote: Transparency matters. It has always mattered, but it matters even more now.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of honesty and transparency in the current real estate climate.
clip.suggested_hook: Why transparency is your secret weapon in real estate today.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Imagine if honesty was your biggest competitive advantage in real estate.",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) In today's market, transparency isn't just nice to have—it's essential. Erin Helle shares why it’s your secret weapon.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) 'Transparency matters. It has always mattered, but it matters even more now.' Erin emphasizes that in a world of uncertainty, being upfront with clients builds trust and sets you apart.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) By prioritizing transparency, you not only enhance your reputation but also create lasting client relationships. Make it a core part of your value proposition.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) How transparent are you with your clients? Start today by sharing one honest insight about the market with them."
  },
  "CAPTION": "Transparency is your secret weapon in real estate. Are you using it? #RealEstate #Transparency",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstate", "#Transparency", "#Trust", "#ClientRelationships", "#ValueProposition"],
```
